job_title: React Developer with Java and Spring Boot
jd: Hi, Greetings from SourceMantra, Please have a look at the below opportunity and reply to me if you are interested. Job: React Developer with Java and Spring BootLocation : Atlanta, GA – Onsite – Need LocalsDuration: Long Term Contract 10+ Years and passport Number is must for Submission. Job Description:Essential Skills:3+ years of experience in React development.2+ years of experience in Java and Spring Boot development.Strong JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3 knowledge.Experience with React hooks, Redux, and MobX.Familiarity with Java 8+, Spring Boot 2+, and Spring Security.Understanding of RESTful API principles.Experience with Agile development methodologies. Desirable Skills:Experience with TypeScript.Knowledge of GraphQL.Familiarity with Docker and containerization.Experience with CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD).Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud). Thanks & RegardsSharath Reesu | Source Mantra, Inc.Senior Talent Acquisition 295 Durham Ave, Suite # 201, South Plainfield, NJ 07080Phone : +1 908 373 8651 Ext: 243 | 732 377 8653 (Fax)Sharath@sourcemantra.com | www.sourcemantra.com
